alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 3:51AM PST until December 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY ALONG THE BASE OF THE BLUE MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected along the base of the Blue Mountains, mainly east and southeast of Milton Freewater and Pendleton. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
